languages.text: "Страж Летуса... Мне все еще не верится, что Леди Теодора хранила от нас такие страшные секреты. Чего еще мы не знаем?"

traits.locale_text: "Страж Летуса... Мне все еще не верится, что Леди Теодора хранила от нас такие страшные секреты. Чего еще мы не знаем?"

languages.text: "The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"
languages.original_text: "Страж Летуса... Мне все еще не верится, что Леди Теодора хранила от нас такие страшные секреты. Чего еще мы не знаем?"

traits.locale_text: "The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"
"The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"

"The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"
"The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"
"The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"

languages.text: 「リーザスの監視者ですか…レディ・シオドーラがあのような恐ろしい秘密を我々に隠しておられたとは、いまだに信じられません。我々の知らないことが、他にどれほどあるのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"

traits.locale_text: 「リーザスの監視者ですか…レディ・シオドーラがあのような恐ろしい秘密を我々に隠しておられたとは、いまだに信じられません。我々の知らないことが、他にどれほどあるのでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Der Wächter von Leethus ... Ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass Lady Theodora derart schreckliche Geheimnisse vor uns hatte. Wovon wissen wir noch nicht?"
languages.original_text: "The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Wächter von Leethus ... Ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass Lady Theodora derart schreckliche Geheimnisse vor uns hatte. Wovon wissen wir noch nicht?"

languages.text: « Le gardien de Leethus... Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire que dame Théodora nous avait caché des secrets aussi terribles. Qu'y a-t-il d'autre que nous ignorons ? »
languages.original_text: "The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"

traits.locale_text: « Le gardien de Leethus... Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire que dame Théodora nous avait caché des secrets aussi terribles. Qu'y a-t-il d'autre que nous ignorons ? »

languages.text: «El vigilante de Leethus... Aún no consigo creer que lady Theodora nos guardase unos secretos tan terribles. ¿Cuánto más desconocemos?».
languages.original_text: "The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"

traits.locale_text: «El vigilante de Leethus... Aún no consigo creer que lady Theodora nos guardase unos secretos tan terribles. ¿Cuánto más desconocemos?».

languages.text: “利瑟斯的守望者……我还是不敢相信，西奥多拉夫人居然对我们隐瞒了那么多可怕的秘密。还有哪些秘密我们是不知道的？”
languages.original_text: "The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"

traits.locale_text: “利瑟斯的守望者……我还是不敢相信，西奥多拉夫人居然对我们隐瞒了那么多可怕的秘密。还有哪些秘密我们是不知道的？”

languages.text: "Leethus Gözcüsü... Leydi Theodora sır küpüymüş meğer. Bilmediğimiz daha neler var acaba?"
languages.original_text: "The watcher of Leethus... I still cannot believe Lady Theodora kept such terrible secrets from us. What else do we not know?"

traits.locale_text: "Leethus Gözcüsü... Leydi Theodora sır küpüymüş meğer. Bilmediğimiz daha neler var acaba?"
